    C

    Chart - org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow中的类
    Represents a chart in the game, which contains the song's notes and gameplay elements.
    Chart() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow.Chart
    Constructs a new Chart object using the song data and the selected level.
    Chart(Song, String) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow.Chart
    Constructs a new Chart based on a given song and difficulty level.
    ChartButtons - org.kelvinizer.game.gamebuttons中的类
    The ChartButtons class represents a collection of interactive buttons (Pause, Play, Restart, Back) used in a game interface.
    ChartButtons() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.game.gamebuttons.ChartButtons
    Constructs the ChartButtons and initializes all the buttons (Pause, Play, Restart, Back).
    chartConstant - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.Selection
    A constant used for chart calculations.
    ChartText - org.kelvinizer.game.gametext中的类
    The ChartText class is responsible for displaying and updating the various statistics during gameplay on the chart screen.
    ChartText() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.game.gametext.ChartText
    Constructs a ChartText object, initializes the text fields, and sets the maximum string sizes.
    collectionDir - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.Selection
    The directory path for the current collection.
    collectionIndex - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.Selection
    The current collection index.
    collections - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.Selection
    The current collection menu.
    CollectionSelection - org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection中的类
    Handles the collection selection menu functionality, including rendering, navigation, and user interactions.
    CollectionSelection() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection.CollectionSelection
    Constructs a CollectionSelection instance, initializes key bindings, and ensures song indices are properly mapped for all collections.
    CollectionSelectionButtons - org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection中的类
    Represents the buttons used in the collection selection menu for navigating left and right.
    CollectionSelectionButtons() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection.CollectionSelectionButtons
    Constructs a CollectionSelectionButtons instance and initializes the buttons for navigating left and right.
    CollectionSelectionText - org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection中的类
    Represents the text components displayed in the collection selection menu.
    CollectionSelectionText() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.menu.collectionselection.CollectionSelectionText
    Constructs a CollectionSelectionText instance and initializes its text components.
    comboScorePercentage - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.constants.JudgementLimits
    The percentage of the score allocated to combo scoring.
    compareTo(Note) - 类中的方法 org.kelvinizer.note.Note
    Compares this note to another note based on the perfect hit time.
    contains(double) - 类中的方法 org.kelvinizer.support.classes.Motion
    Checks whether a time point passed in is within the Motion object time frame, that is, a between start and end.
    contains(Point) - 类中的方法 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CShape
    Determines if the specified point is contained within the shape.
    Control - org.kelvinizer.constants中的类
    The Control class provides constants and utility methods for managing the application's state, user data, and resources.
    Control() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.constants.Control
     
    CRect - org.kelvinizer.shapes中的类
    Represents a rectangle shape with customizable position, size, and origin.
    CRect() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CRect
    Constructs a rectangle with default position (0, 0) and size (0, 0).
    CRect(double, double) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CRect
    Constructs a rectangle with the specified size, positioned at (0, 0).
    CRect(double, double, double, double) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CRect
    Constructs a rectangle with the specified position and size.
    CRectButton - org.kelvinizer.buttons中的类
    The CRectButton class represents a custom button with rectangular bounds and support for different states (normal, focused, and selected).
    CRectButton() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.buttons.CRectButton
    Constructs a new CRectButton.
    CShape - org.kelvinizer.shapes中的类
    An abstract class representing a customizable shape with properties for fill color, outline color, and outline thickness.
    CShape() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CShape
    Constructs a CShape with no fill, no outline, and an outline thickness of 0.0.
    CShape(Color, Color, double) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CShape
    Constructs a CShape with specified fill color, outline color, and outline thickness.
    CTriangle - org.kelvinizer.shapes中的类
    Represents a triangle shape defined by three points.
    CTriangle() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CTriangle
    Constructs a triangle with all points initialized to (0, 0).
    CTriangle(double, double, double, double, double, double) - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.shapes.CTriangle
    Constructs a triangle with the specified coordinates for its three points.
    CTriangleButton - org.kelvinizer.buttons中的类
    The CTriangleButton class represents a button with a triangular shape and two states: normal and focused.
    CTriangleButton() - 类的构造器 org.kelvinizer.buttons.CTriangleButton
    Constructs a new CTriangleButton.
    CURRENT_TIME - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow.Chart
    The current time in the song or chart, used to track and sync the gameplay with the audio and notes.
    currentCombo - 类中的静态变量 org.kelvinizer.game.gamewindow.Lane
    Statistics tracking different types of hits and combo states.
